name: Card 'em up (sandsower)
description:
Move with WASD, play cards with left click, reshuffle with right click. Collect cards left by enemies to build up your deck!

Blue cards (bullets) adds more shots to your deck, so that those pesky Blank cards are less of a hassle.

Red cards (super) let you fire a super shot, slow moving but very powerful.

Green cards (points) act as a Blank so they don't do damage, but they'll score you 100 points at the end.
